bill.summary: 4/25/2006--Introduced. Commends the Community of Sant'Egidio for their worldwide charity and generosity on behalf of the poor, and honors the Community for promoting peace throughout the world, especially in Africa. Thanks the Community for providing the international forum of the 2006 Prayer for Peace.
